definition: on leaving/on the point of departure
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: The Emperor consented to send Zhaojun. While bidding farewell. the Emperor saw Zhaojun for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 在臨行辭別的時候，元帝才首次見到昭君的美貌。

sentences.english: Prior to departure, a large wide hopes can help him find his girlfriend Xiao Yang in music.
sentences.chinese: 臨行前，大寬希望肖揚能幫他找到女朋友于樂。

sentences.english: A day before departure we were still lacking an itinerary.
sentences.chinese: 就在臨行的前一天，我們還沒制定出旅行計劃。

sentences.english: She embraced her son before leaving.
Prior to departure, his next stop in her window for a whole night.
sentences.chinese: 臨行前，他在她窗下站了整整一夜。

sentences.english: He scribbled a note to his sister before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 臨行前，他給妹妹草草寫了一封短信。

sentences.english: They don't complain or feel regret for anything they did heart and soul for their children.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚臨行告別的時候，我深深感覺到外婆內心的空落。

sentences.english: He wrote me a scribbled letter before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 他臨行前給我寫了一封字跡潦草的短信。

sentences.english: Talking about that toy bull was the last thing he said to me before bidding me farewell.
sentences.chinese: 那個玩具牛是他臨行前說起的最後一個話題。

sentences.english: Farewell to the wound leave way, forget her, gin deep and shallow.
sentences.chinese: 惜別傷離方寸亂，忘了臨行，酒盞深和淺。

lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
